titleStmt.title: The coronation of Dauid Wherein out of that part of the historie of David, that sheweth how he came to the kingdome, wee have set forth unto is what is like to be the end of these troubles that daylie arise for the Gospels sake. By Edm. Bunny.
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Edmund, 1540-1619.

titleStmt.title: The coronation of Dauid Wherein out of that part of the historie of David, that sheweth how he came to the kingdome, wee have set forth unto is what is like to be the end of these troubles that daylie arise for the Gospels sake. By Edm. Bunny.
titleStmt.author: Bunny, Edmund, 1540-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Orwin for Thomas Gubbin and Iohn Perin,

notesStmt.note: Includes, with caption title: The argument of both the Psalmes of the fyrst sort.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Top border McK. &F. 117 dated 1588 in the sill.
